content.rendered:
TOP HOLIDAY BEAUTY GIFTS

We are in the full Holiday swing with the New Year 2019 fast approaching. It’s time to get a little more glam and festive with new beauty products, and holiday looks. I’m really loving this silk eye mask to get your beauty rest for all the holiday parties. This cute eye mask is from Nordstrom.com and would make the perfect holiday gift. I don’t know about you but I always put on a red lip for holiday parties even for the ugly sweater party. Anyone going to an ugly holiday sweater party? How fun are those?

You can purchase the D’Lashes lipstick in red as well as other popular colors here. Also, what’s a party without stunning lashes? Make your lash extension appointments early so you don’t have to worry about not looking your best this month. Lash extensions are simple to put in and easy to take care off. If you don’t have time you can purchase the famous D’Lashes strip lashes here. Happy Holidays!

1: Holiday look from FWRD.COM 2: Lash Extensions Appointment Click Here (Book Early For The Holidays!). 3: Shop D’Lashes Beauty Here. 4 Chanel nail polish gift set, eye mask, and YSL gel perfume stick from Nordstrom.com 

LOVE DIONNE
